main event: A sighting of a yellow rectangular object was reported in the sky over Brooklyn, New York on September 7, 1968.
interesting points: The object was seen by three witnesses,It appeared in the southeastern sky and was described as possibly a hot air balloon,The sighting lasted approximately 2 to 3 minutes,Parts of the object seemed to separate and were seen falling,There is no photographic evidence included in the report.
sighted object: a yellow rectangular object in the sky
witness description: The witnesses included R. King Jr. and family members who observed the phenomenon from different locations within the house.
